forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High 14C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 58F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then becoming windy with rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
